sidebar.name: MOHADESE JOKAR
sidebar.description:
I build accessible, pixel-perfect digital
experiences for the web.

about.title: About
about.firstParagraph: I'm a passionate developer dedicated to creating accessible and visually stunning user interfaces that combine thoughtful design with strong technical foundations. I take great pleasure in working at the intersection of design and development, crafting experiences that not only look impressive but are also finely tuned for performance and user-friendliness.
about.secondParagraph: My career aspirations revolve around using my creativity to build beautiful software and deliver engaging experiences for users. My goal is to craft applications that not only serve a purpose but also create memorable interactions for users, all while maintaining a strong focus on performance and accessibility.
about.thirdParagraph: I'm always eager to learn new skills and take on fresh challenges, constantly growing and improving. The technology landscape is constantly evolving, and I’m committed to staying up to date with the latest tools and trends. By continuously enhancing my abilities, I aim to tackle new challenges head-on and push the boundaries of what I can achieve as a developer.
about.fourthParagraph: So far, I have acquired a broad set of skills and valuable experience, though I am currently not working at a company. I have worked on freelance projects and learned a great deal from each experience. My goal is to contribute to the success of the team and projects.

cards.title: Frontend Developer · TechVision
cards.description: Develop and optimize responsive web applications, crafting seamless user experiences with modern frameworks. Work on interactive components, performance tuning, and accessibility improvements for clients such as startup platforms, e-commerce brands, and educational institutions. Collaborate closely with designers and backend engineers to build scalable, maintainable solutions.

cards.title: UI Engineer · VisionSoft
cards.description: Developed and optimized web applications for project management and team collaboration. Built interactive components with smooth user interactions and optimized data loading for improved performance across various devices.

cards.title: Lead Frontend Engineer · WebFlow
cards.description: Spearheaded the development of dynamic and accessible UI components, ensuring a seamless user experience across WebFlow's platform. Focused on optimizing performance, refining design systems, and enhancing accessibility standards. Worked closely with multidisciplinary teams to create intuitive and visually compelling interfaces.

cards.title: Web Developer · Creative Hub
cards.description: Worked alongside a team of designers and developers to build user-friendly websites, design scalable branding systems, and develop digital solutions for community-based initiatives.

cards.title: Software Engineer Co-op · Starry
cards.description: Worked with the UI team to improve and enhance features of Starry’s Android app. Focused on ensuring the app’s performance, fixing bugs, and implementing new functionalities. Responsible for collaborating with the team through all stages of development to ensure the app delivered an optimal user experience. Contributed code for front-end features and ensured they were fully integrated into the app while maintaining a seamless and responsive interface.

cards.title: Creative Technologist Co-op · MullenLowe U.S.
cards.description: Worked as part of the creative team to develop and ship high-quality, client-facing websites. Responsible for maintaining the technical integrity of projects by delivering clean, production-ready code. Collaborated with designers and developers to ensure the seamless integration of designs and features, while adhering to client specifications. Contributed to projects for major clients like JetBlue, Lovesac, U.S. Cellular, and the U.S. Department of Defense, ensuring their digital presence was modern, responsive, and performant.

projects.title: Projects

cards.title: First Portfolio Website - HTML & CSS Only
cards.description: The first portfolio website I designed and built in 2020. This is a company website where I only used HTML and CSS for this project, without even using Flex or Grid. It was fascinating to be able to create a single page using just HTML and CSS and prove that a lot can be accomplished with minimal tools. It's just a single page.

cards.title: Food Delivery Website
cards.description: This is my second portfolio project related to a fast food delivery website. In this project, I used HTML, CSS, Grid, and Flex to design and build the layout. My goal for the future is to expand this project, enhance its functionality, add more features, and incorporate even more advanced technologies. This is just the beginning!

cards.title: Classic Cars Website
cards.description: This is a classic car website I created, which was quite challenging since I was just starting. I faced many difficulties, but I learned a lot throughout the process. In the future, I plan to turn this into a multi-page site. I focused on using HTML, CSS, JS, and Bootstrap to ensure a smooth layout and responsive design. This was my first experience with Bootstrap, and I really enjoyed it.

projects.moreInfo: More information about me line_end_arrow_notch

footer.text: Loosely designed in Figma and coded in Visual Studio Code by yours truly. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, deployed with Vercel. All text is set in the Inter typeface.

infoSection.name: Mohadese Jokar
infoSection.description:
I’m a front-end developer specializing in building interactive web experiences.
Currently, I’m working with React and exploring the capabilities of Next.js

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.text1: Hello! My name is MOHADESE, and I enjoy creating things for the web. My journey into web development started in 2020 when I decided to edit custom Tumblr themes. What seemed like a small project turned into an amazing learning experience and taught me a lot about HTML and CSS.
aboutSection.text2: Since then, I’ve focused on building interactive, user-friendly web applications and have continuously improved my skills in technologies like React and Next.js. Besides personal projects, I also have freelance experience, having worked as a web developer on various projects. This opportunity has allowed me to strengthen my problem-solving skills and expand my knowledge of modern web development.
aboutSection.text3: Currently, I’m diving deeper into React, exploring Next.js, learning TypeScript, and staying updated on the latest trends in front-end development.
aboutSection.text4: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

jobs.title: Web Development
items: Developing modern web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.
Building interactive, responsive, and user-friendly websites.
Experience with Next.js, TypeScript, and RESTful APIs.
Writing clean, maintainable code with best practices in web development.

jobs.title: Freelance Work
items: Working on freelance projects in web development, WordPress customization, and UI/UX design.
Managing client communications and delivering custom solutions within deadlines.
Building a strong portfolio with diverse project experiences.
Providing ongoing support and maintenance for completed projects.

jobs.title: Design & Editing
items: Creating high-quality graphics using Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Lightroom.
Video editing with Adobe Premiere Pro and Final Cut Pro.
Designing social media content, branding materials, and UI/UX assets.
Working on creative projects that involve photo retouching and visual storytelling.

jobs.title: WordPress Development
items: Developing and customizing WordPress themes and plugins.
Optimizing WordPress websites for speed, security, and SEO.
Creating custom functionalities using PHP and JavaScript.
Helping businesses establish their online presence with professional WordPress sites.

jobs.title: SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
items: Improving website rankings with keyword research and technical SEO strategies.
Using SEO tools like Google Analytics, SEMrush, and Ahrefs for performance tracking.
Optimizing page speed, content, and metadata for better search visibility.
Developing link-building strategies and off-page SEO techniques.

jobs.title: Tools & Technologies
items: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, TypeScript
WordPress (Themes, Plugins, Customization)
Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro
Git, GitHub, VS Code, Webpack, npm

items.title: Frontend Development
items.description: I specialize in crafting modern, responsive, and interactive web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also work with frameworks and libraries like React to create seamless user experiences.

items.title: JavaScript Mastery
items.description: JavaScript is at the core of my development process. From DOM manipulation to handling APIs and creating dynamic user interactions, I ensure that every feature is both functional and efficient.

items.title: Responsive Web Design
items.description: I design and develop websites that are fully responsive, ensuring a seamless experience across all devices. I use CSS techniques like Flexbox, Grid, and media queries to achieve a pixel-perfect layout.

items.title: Code Optimization
items.description: Writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code is a priority for me. I follow best practices such as modularization, DRY principles, and performance optimization to deliver high-quality solutions.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description1: If you have a project idea, need a front-end developer, or just want to discuss web development,
contact.description2: I’d love to hear from you! Feel free to reach out via email and let's make something amazing together.
